https://tmrev.io/movie/747976-Charles Beaumont: The Short Life of Twilight Zone's Magic Man 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cMcilypPVTriCrtzIxZF0puqoWC.jpg A documentary about one of the most influential science fiction writers of the 1950s and 1960s. Charles Beaumont was responsible for penning some of the most memorable Twilight Zone episodes before his untimely death at age 38. Charles Beaumont: The Short Life of Twilight Zone's Magic Man
